title: 84/273/Euratom, ECSC, EEC: Commission Decision of 13 April 1984 concerning the Federal Republic of Germany pursuant to Article 13 (2) of Regulation (EEC, Euratom, ECSC) No 2892/77 concerning own resources accruing from value added tax (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 April 1984
concerning the Federal Republic of Germany pursuant to Article 13 (2) of Regulation (EEC, Euratom, ECSC) No 2892/77 concerning own resources accruing from value added tax
(Only the German text is authentic)
(84/273/Euratom, ECSC, EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Decision 81/478/Euratom, ECSC, EEC is hereby extended for 1983 and subsequent years with consequential amendments to the years in Article 1 of that Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 April 1984.
For the Commission
Christopher TUGENDHAT
Vice-President
